front.title: A Link Relation Type for Issue Management

abstract.t: This memo defines a link relation for associating resources on the Web with other resources that list issues for those resources. The notion of an "issue" is used in a broad sense in this memo. Issues can be bug reports, abuse reports, or any other kind of items that are meant to raise awareness and be collected and managed in a structured way. Often, issue management is driven by structured workflows, but these workflows and how to represent them are outside the scope of this memo.

section.title: Introduction
section.t: The concept of identifying "issues" about resources is widely used, both on and off the Web and the Internet. "Issues" can be a variety of things, and in its most abstract sense just mean that there are some structured notes about a resource, and that these notes represent annotations regarding the resource, and often some kind of status.
